definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: The new box could be epoxied or screw attached into place.
sentences.chinese: 該新盒可以用用環氧樹脂粘合或螺栓連接到位。

sentences.english: Liquid crystalline epoxy resin is a kind of liquid crystalline thermosets .
sentences.chinese: 液晶環氧樹脂是一種具有廣闊應用前景的液晶熱固體。

sentences.english: J-800A/B is a two part epoxy paste adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 是一種雙組分環氧樹脂膏狀膠粘劑。

sentences.english: Polyesters exhibit better non-yellowing properties than epoxies, but not as good as aliphatic urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯的耐黃性優於環氧樹脂，但弱於脂肪族聚氨酯。

sentences.english: The zero current transformer of the type LXK is casting resin and indoor product.
sentences.chinese: 本型零序電流互感器爲環氧樹脂澆注戶內型產品。

sentences.english: Volatiles should not be added to the epoxies to improve their viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 不應將揮發物加到環氧樹脂中去改善它們的粘性。

sentences.english: The products are made of metallized polypropylene film, seal with epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 金屬化聚丙烯膜卷繞而成，阻燃環氧樹脂封封。

sentences.english: A pouring adhesive made of epoxy resin for glazing vane wheel was prepared in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究開發了研磨頁輪用單組分環氧樹脂澆鑄膠粘劑。

sentences.english: Polyesters are less brittle than epoxies, but not as flexible or tough as urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯沒有環氧樹脂發脆，但也沒有聚氨酯的堅韌性。

sentences.english: The epoxy resin sealant has extensive application in the electronic and electrical equipment industry.
sentences.chinese: 環氧樹脂灌封膠在電子電器工業領域應用廣泛。

sentences.english: For situations where extreme water resistance is required, epoxy is the best choice.
sentences.chinese: 在需要極端耐水的情況下，環氧樹脂是最好的選擇。

sentences.english: The changes of electrical characteristics of varistors after being coated in epoxy resin were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了壓敏電阻器在環氧樹脂灌封后的電性能變化。

sentences.english: This paper introduced detailed two kinds of hardener of epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 本文比較詳細地介紹了環氧樹脂兩類固化劑。

sentences.english: The sulfonium salt has better curing character to epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 該硫鎓鹽對環氧樹脂具有良好的固化性能。

sentences.english: The silane treated carbon steel was adhered by epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 對碳鋼表面進行硅烷處理，用環氧樹脂膠黏劑粘接。

sentences.english: These inconveniences make epoxies a bad choice for everyday work.
sentences.chinese: 這些不便使得環氧樹脂不能在日常使用中得以普及。
